name: Tween3D
shortDescription: Smoothly animate scale and rotation of 3d models.
description: Change models proportions and orientation over time to make smooth animations.

eventsFunctions.description: the stretch on Z axis. The object volume is conseved. A stretch of 2 make the object apear 2 time longer on Z in proportion to the dimension on X and Y.
eventsFunctions.name: StretchZ

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly animate scale and rotation of 3d models.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Tween3D

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object stretch Z from its current value to a new one. The stretch can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenStretchZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the stretch Z of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object stretch Y from its current value to a new one. The stretch can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenStretchY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the stretch Y of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object scale volume from its current value to a new one. The scale volume can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenScaleVolume
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the scale volume of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object rotation X from its current value to a new one.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenRotationX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the rotation X of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object rotation Y from its current value to a new one.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenRotationY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the rotation Y of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: TweenedValue
